data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'eDefter Satırları - Interface View'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.semanticKey: ['CompanyCode', 'AccountingDocument', 'FiscalYear', 'AccountingDocumentItem']

define view entity ZETR_I_EDEFTERLINE
  as select from zetr_t_defky
{
  key bukrs     as CompanyCode,
  key budat     as PostingDate,
  key belnr     as AccountingDocument,
  key gjahr     as FiscalYear,
  key buzei     as AccountingDocumentItem,
  key docln     as DocumentLineNumber,
      bcode     as Bcode,
      monat     as FiscalPeriod,
      tsfyd     as Tsfyd,
      partn     as PartnerCompany,
      dfbuz     as Dfbuz,
      linen     as LineNumber,
      yevno     as Yevno,
      blart     as DocumentType,
      gbtur     as Gbtur,
      blart_t   as DocumentTypeText,
      oturu     as Oturu,
      bldat     as DocumentDate,
      cpudt     as EntryDate,
      usnam     as UserName,
      tcode     as TransactionCode,
      xblnr     as ReferenceDocument,
      stblg     as ReversingDocument,
      stjah     as ReversingDocumentFiscalYear,
      bktxt     as DocumentHeaderText,
      waers     as Currency,
      bstat     as DocumentStatus,
      awtyp     as ReferenceDocumentType,
      awkey     as ReferenceDocumentKey,
      xblnr_alt as AlternativeReferenceDocument,
      bschl     as PostingKey,
      koart     as AccountType,
      umskz     as SpecialGLIndicator,
      shkzg     as DebitCreditIndicator,
      shkzg_srt as DebitCreditSort,
      gsber     as BusinessArea,
      mwskz     as TaxCode,

      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
      dmbtr_def as AmountInLocalCurrency,

      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
      dmbtr     as Amount,

      ktosl     as AccountKey,
      sgtxt     as ItemText,
      altkt     as AlternativeAccount,
      kostl     as CostCenter,
      pernr     as PersonnelNumber,
      saknr     as GLAccount,
      zuonr     as AssignmentNumber,
      hkont     as GeneralLedgerAccount,
      hkont_3   as GLAccount3Digit,
      xcpdd     as Xcpdd,
      kunnr     as Customer,
      lifnr     as Supplier,
      kname     as CustomerName,
      lname     as SupplierName,
      zlsch     as PaymentMethod,
      xnegp     as NegativePostingIndicator,
      dif45     as Dif45,
      cldoc     as ClearingDocument,
      clitm     as ClearingDocumentItem,
      orbuk     as OriginalCompanyCode
}
